title: Prisoner (feat. Dua Lipa)
author: Miley Cyrus
lyrics:
[00:00.28] Prisoner, prisoner
[00:02.22] Locked up, can't get you off my mind, off my mind
[00:05.94] Lord knows I tried a million times, million times, oh-woah
[00:11.22] Why can't you, why can't you just let me go?
[00:17.61] Strung out on a feeling, my hands are tied
[00:21.46] Your face on my ceiling, I fantasize
[00:24.66] Oh, I can't control it, I can't control it (I can't control it)
[00:32.65] I try to replace it with city lights
[00:36.41] I'll never escape it, I need the high
[00:39.47] Oh, I can't control it, I can't control it (oh-oh)
[00:45.92] You keep making it harder to stay
[00:50.19] But I still can't run away, I gotta know
[00:54.43] Why can't you, why can't you just let me go?
[00:58.42] Prisoner, prisoner
[01:00.47] Locked up, can't get you off my mind, off my mind
[01:04.30] Lord knows I tried a million times, million times, oh-woah
[01:09.30] Why can't you, why can't you just let me go?
[01:13.11] Prisoner, prisoner
[01:15.42] Locked up, can't get you off my mind, off my mind
[01:19.02] Lord knows I tried a million times, million times, oh-woah
[01:24.40] Why can't you, why can't you just let me go?
[01:28.69] I tasted heaven, now I can't live without it
[01:32.36] I can't forget you, and your love is the loudest
[01:35.86] Oh, I can't control it, I can't control it (can't control it)
[01:42.14] You keep making it harder to stay
[01:46.41] But I still can't run away, I gotta know
[01:50.47] Why can't you, why can't you just let me go?
[01:54.51] Prisoner, prisoner
[01:56.72] Locked up, can't get you off my mind, off my mind
[02:00.34] Lord knows I tried a million times, million times, oh-woah
[02:05.54] Why can't you, why can't you just let me go?
[02:09.42] Prisoner, prisoner
[02:11.66] Locked up, can't get you off my mind, off my mind (off my mind)
[02:15.58] Lord knows I tried a million times, million times, oh-woah
[02:20.43] Why can't you, why can't you just let me go?
[02:27.26] Can't get you off my mind (why can't you just let me go?)
[02:33.15] Million times
[02:34.59] I wanna know why can't you, why can't you?
[02:38.52] I wanna know why can't you, why can't you?
[02:42.36] I gotta know why can't you, why can't you just let me go?
[02:46.57]
